Text: Invitation to WhartonEconomist Intelligence Unit conferencecooperation with the Economist Intelligence Unit and harton we are pleased to invite you and your colleagues to a oneday workshop on The Conscious Corporation Organizing for Knowledge in the Global Economy The date is December th and the location is the Aresty Executive Education Building at the Wharton School in Philadelphia We feel this subject is of pivotal importance in todays fastmoving economy The experiences over the past decade in knowledge management indicate that directives to share knowledge are rarely adequate Knowledge development requires active and ongoing mechanisms of organizing to sustain the exchange The workshop will consist of presentations of Wharton faculty research plus the experiences of industry We are attaching an agenda We do hope you can join us Contact Rachel Barrett at if you are interested in attending Very truly yours Sid Winter Bruce Kogut CoDirectors Reginald H Jones Center The Wharton School University of Pennsylvania Agendadoc Agendahtm
